channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for RI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for RI

item.title: Report I-2025030057
item.description:
Report I-2025030057

Identified by scraper @ 2025-07-23T00:58:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-24
  • City: Providence
  • State: RI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: PERFORMANCE TRANS INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 2666
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: Drain pipes which pass through the compartment had plugged, filled with water, and we had a ahhrd freeze which in turn split the piping inside the compartment. This was unable to be seen, as pipes are physically inside the compartment, so driver found out when he was loading that compartment, and product started running out the bottom of the trailer.
